Articles.Content:
Hi all

Been playing around with KSP since 0.9 and only managed a couple of orbits (more by luck than judgement) untill 0.11 and we got our nice orbit view.

I\'m really exited about the next update and we can all have a Mun race.

Good luck everyone with your future launches, and I hope I can help as much as possible on this forum.

Pyra.

Hi!

Good to see new members joining the forums

Happy Launching!

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
